description: From private to private. Call us and visit this house. Spacious 160 m² apartment in Torres de la Alameda, province of Madrid. Ideal for couples or investors. It is located on the ground floor and has a spacious and bright living room, a furnished kitchen completely independent from the rest of the rooms, two bedrooms and a complete bathroom. In addition, the apartment has a terrace to enjoy natural light throughout the room and a patio, with many possibilities. The property is all exterior, due to its east orientation, in this house you will enjoy the sun in the morning. The house is sold furnished and in good condition, ready to move into. As for the qualities, this apartment has gas heating, air conditioning, aluminum exterior carpentry, stoneware floors, easy maintenance and to make you feel safer in your home, the main door is armored. This house is located in a quiet and well-connected area, very close to the bus stop. For greater comfort, the house is very close to a school and all the necessary services. At Housell we offer you a large selection of properties that adapt to your lifestyle. Don't miss this opportunity to find the perfect house for you. h1o3u8s1e9l6l.

This one-story villa is a true gem of architecture and design. Upon entering the hall, the perfect layout of the home is immediately evident. To the right, we find the first bathroom of the house, while moving forward, we come across a square kitchen, impeccably designed and with a dining space that can comfortably accommodate a table with chairs. At the end of the hallway, we are welcomed by the impressive living room, the heart of the home, with a fireplace that provides cozy warmth during the winters. From here, you access a spectacular terrace with pergola and views of the beautiful rear garden. Towards the other side of the house, there are the bedrooms: the first two are bright and cozy, both with built-in wardrobes. At the back, the fabulous master bedroom has a large dressing room and a truly exceptional en-suite bathroom. The construction of the house is solid and the qualities are first class. The floors are made of porcelain stoneware, the doors are made of high-quality oak, and the climalit aluminum windows, lacquered in white, offer excellent energy efficiency. The boiler area has individual doors for each room, which adds a touch of organization and functionality. Best of all is the basement, which is raw and offers a blank canvas to let your imagination run wild and customize it to the owner's needs and desires. In short, this chalet is a true gem that you cannot miss. We are sure that you will fall in love with its well-distributed spaces, its construction quality and its endless customization possibilities.

Alcalá Inmobiliaria sells a wonderful independent villa of 188 m2 built (according to cadastre) + the meters of the basement, on a 248m2 plot, in the best area of Torres de la Alameda, 15 minutes from Alcalá de Henares It is distributed over 3 floors: On the ground floor, entrance through the front patio with access to the entrance porch to the house, 33 m2 living room, large bright independent kitchen extended with a glass-enclosed office, furnished with basic appliances (oven, hood and ceramic hob) and with access to the patio 60m2 rear, porch with pergola conditioned to enjoy with the family, built-in barbecue and warehouse-type hut where the natural gas boiler is, full bathroom with built-in shower, 2 built-in wardrobes, shoe and coat rack, 3 bedrooms and In the main room, a suite-type bathroom with a built-in shower tray. On the ground floor we find a completely renovated open-plan attic fitted out as 1 double bedroom, large living room and ready installation for a bathroom and kitchen, lights on the floor, industrial air conditioning with heat pump, with access to a solarium terrace. In the basement, open plan kitchen with island, furnished with basic appliances (oven, hood and ceramic hob), iron fireplace with wood, wood oven, full bathroom with built-in shower, ironing room, pantry, 1 bedroom (with the possibility open window), 14m2 workshop, 33 m2 garage for 2 cars with motorized door. Top quality materials, heating and hot water with natural gas boiler, porcelain floors and tiles, double glazed aluminum windows, mosquito nets, built-in wardrobes in all rooms, marble floors, AC 52 pergo wood flooring, stair railing. glass, air conditioning with heat pump, and bars throughout the house, excellent conservation. Torres de la Alameda has two nursery schools, a primary school, a secondary school, an adult school, four bus lines that connect the town with Alcalá de Henares, Arganda and Madrid, sports facilities and a location that allows you to reach Madrid. in 30 minutes and to Alcalá de Henares in 15 minutes. Call us and visit this house. 85 m² apartment in Torres de la Alameda, province of Madrid. This house, due to its size, meets the needs of a family with children. You will not find another home like this spectacular semi-detached house with a private pool in the best area of Torres de la Alameda. It is a property made on a whim, with the best possible qualities. It has a basement with space for three vehicles, and an automatic access door, and a boiler room. with a variety of uses in addition to the garage, such as workshop, cellar, etc. We access the house through a glazed porch that leads to the main entrance. Upon entering you can already perceive the exceptional nature of the house, with an open stairwell, where you can enjoy the spectacular bubinga wood railing, high quality wood, resistant and very decorative, carved by hand and with solid steps through which we access both to upper floors such as the basement. All the doors are of this same exceptional wood. On this ground floor we can enjoy a large independent living room, a bedroom, a bathroom with a shower and a newly renovated kitchen with basic appliances and access to the back porch and pool. On the first floor we find 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and an en-suite bedroom with a sunny terrace, dressing room and bathroom. In the upper part of the house and as the culmination of this exclusive property, a large attic (Unconditioned) with two wonderful terraces with spectacular views, one of them. The construction qualities are unbeatable. stairs, doors and built-in wardrobes of the aforementioned wood, on the ground floor, superior quality rustic-style ceramic flooring and on the first floor solid WOOD flooring. Double Climalit windows with armored glass on the ground floor. Air conditioning in living room, smooth paint, gas heating and hot water. You only have to finish falling in love by visiting it and admiring its style, impeccable condition and its sunny and wide spaces. The indicated meters are taken from the cadastre and/or registry. The sales prices do not include legal taxes or deed expenses.  .

Last days on sale! Valeshouse Real Estate offers you: Incredible opportunity! We present this wonderful semi-detached house located on two adjoining plots. with a total of 500m2. The house is built on one of the plots and consists of three floors, this house has all the amenities you need to live in complete comfort. At the entrance, you will be greeted by a large closed porch with a practical built-in closet for coats, shoes, etc. Large kitchen completely renovated and with a pantry, it is perfect for food lovers. Furthermore, on the ground floor you will find a toilet and a cozy living/dining room with fireplace and air conditioning. The chalet has front and rear patios, a garage for one car and a closed clothesline. On the upper floor, you will find three spacious and bright bedrooms, all of them equipped with new built-in wardrobes and wooden floors. The full bathroom, also renovated, has a large bathtub and a practical sliding door. But that's not all, in the basement you will find a large living room, an additional room and a boiler room, all renovated and ready to enjoy. In addition, on the adjacent plot you will find a spectacular 30m² built-in swimming pool, a woodshed, a barbecue area, a garage for two cars and a storage room. The house has windows and sliding doors with Climalit glass. + shutters which guarantee excellent thermal and acoustic insulation, A/C in the living room and the 3 bedrooms, in addition, it is very bright on all its floors. For your comfort, it has solar panels and heating with diesel radiators in all rooms. The fireplace, for its part, heats the entire house, giving you a cozy and comfortable atmosphere, stoneware and wooden floors, interior carpentry in oak. This chalet is ideal for a family, located next to Olof Park and the school. In addition, the town has all the necessary services, such as a medical center and schools, institute, supermarket, Municipal sports center, Medical Center 20 minutes from Alcalá de Henares 30 from Adolfo Suarez airport Don't miss the opportunity to live in this beautiful and cozy house. Legal taxes and deed expenses not included in the final sale price. - Built area: 200 m² - Useful area: 184 m² - 4 bedrooms - 2 bathrooms - Terrace - Second hand/Good condition - Built-in wardrobes - Storage room - North, South Orientation - 500 m² plot - Parking place.

description: ORTIZ2001 SL sells SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE in a residential area of TORRES DE LA ALAMEDA. It is a 188m2 property distributed over 2 floors as follows: - GROUND FLOOR: It has a distributor hall that gives access to a toilet, kitchen, living room, 1 bedroom on the ground floor and garage. All the residences are exterior. The living room is spacious and cozy and leads out to the patio through a large window. It also has air conditioning and fireplace. The kitchen has an office area and access to a 27 m2 garage. It is furnished and with electrical appliances, being the American type refrigerator, large dimensions The garage has a motorized door, space for a car on the surface and plenty of storage. The bedroom on the ground floor is especially functional and has a fitted and lined wardrobe. The orientation in this area of the house is to the east through the kitchen and to the west in the pool. - FIRST FLOOR: 3 exterior bedrooms are located, with fitted wardrobes. The main one is especially spacious and has two very large closets and an en-suite bathroom. In addition, this floor has a second good-sized bathroom. The plot is completely fenced, very sunny with a built-in barbecue. In the garden, a modern outdoor decking was installed, surrounding the individual pool. In addition, it has a built-in barbecue, as well as a beautiful fountain. The back porch was enlarged and roofed over, creating a very pleasant outdoor seating area. Wide staircase to the upper floor. Very good condition. Ideal to enjoy and rest with the family! The town, with almost 8,000 inhabitants, offers an excellent quality of family life. Located 40 km from Madrid capital and 9 km from Alcalá de Henares. It is accessed by highways M-220, M-224 and M-225, which connect the town with its immediate neighborhoods. To the west, away from the town center is the M-300, which connects Alcalá de Henares with Loeches until it reaches the A-3 motorway (Madrid-Valencia). REQUEST MORE INFORMATION WITHOUT OBLIGATION! At ORTIZ 2001 SL, WE DO NOT CHARGE PURCHASE COMMISSIONS OR MORTGAGE MANAGEMENT!

GPA-18990 Welcome to this charming town house on one floor in the town of Torres de la Alameda! With its 135 m2 of well-distributed space, this house is perfect for those looking for comfort and practicality in a quiet environment. Let me show you everything this home has to offer. Upon entering the house, you will be greeted by spacious rooms that provide a feeling of light and spaciousness. The single-story design guarantees a stair-free layout, which facilitates mobility and makes this house an ideal option for both young couples and older people. The house has two spacious bedrooms, each equipped with built-in wardrobes, providing ample storage space to meet all your needs. Comfort is guaranteed all year round thanks to the air conditioning system, which will maintain the perfect temperature in both hot summers and colder winters. You can enjoy a pleasant atmosphere in all seasons without worrying about temperature fluctuations. The bathroom offers a functional and relaxing space. Its modern features will allow you to enjoy moments of tranquility and comfort. One of the standout features of this property is its lovely private patio. Here you can relax outdoors, enjoy al fresco meals or even grow a small garden. This outdoor space is perfect for spending quality time with family and friends, organizing barbecues or simply disconnecting from the daily hustle and bustle. The house was completely renovated just 3 years ago, which means that all elements and finishes are modern and in excellent condition. You won't have to worry about expensive renovations, as this home is ready for you to move in and enjoy from day one. Located in a village with a community of around 8,000 residents, this property offers the perfect combination of rural tranquility and convenient access to city amenities. Being just 30 minutes from Madrid will allow you to enjoy all the cultural, shopping and entertainment opportunities the city has to offer, while giving you the chance to escape the hustle and bustle and enjoy a more relaxed lifestyle. Don't miss the opportunity to be the owner of this charming town house on one floor. Its spacious rooms, functional design, private patio and privileged location make it an irresistible option. Contact us today to arrange a visit and fall in love with this wonderful property!
